Description of incident: The theft of a laptop from the office of Arrow Electronics has resulted in the company notifying 4,004 current and former employees that their personal information was on the laptop. The laptop was stolen during a break-in on February 18. Personal information on the laptop included names, addresses, telephone numbers, and for some of those who used company Blackberry, wireless AirCard and calling card services, their Social Security numbers, some credit card information such as last four digits, security code, and expiration date.
